_meta.description: Complete Nerd Fonts collection with CDN URLs, CSS imports, and installation commands

programming.description: Fonts optimized for programming with ligatures, clear distinctions, and excellent readability

terminal.description: Fonts designed for terminal use with powerline symbols and compact designs

dense.description: Narrow fonts for maximum information density

accessible.description: Fonts designed for accessibility and readability

google-fonts.description: Fonts available on Google Fonts for easy web integration

modern-dev.heading: geist-mono-nerd
modern-dev.description: Vercel's cohesive font system - use the Geist package

professional.heading: jetbrains-mono-nerd
professional.description: JetBrains Mono for everything - professional and clean

hacker.heading: fira-code-nerd
hacker.description: Fira Code with ligatures - popular open source choice

microsoft.heading: caskaydia-cove-nerd
microsoft.description: Cascadia Code - designed for Windows Terminal

dense-terminal.heading: iosevka-term-nerd
dense-terminal.description: Maximum density for terminal power users

classic-terminal.heading: meslo-lg-nerd
classic-terminal.description: Meslo - the classic terminal font derived from Menlo

creative-coding.heading: victor-mono-nerd
creative-coding.description: Victor Mono with distinctive cursive italics

accessible-reading.heading: atkinson-hyperlegible-mono-nerd
accessible-reading.description: Maximum legibility for low vision users

jetbrains-mono-nerd.name: JetBrainsMono Nerd Font
jetbrains-mono-nerd.description: JetBrains officially created font for developers with excellent ligatures and readability

fira-code-nerd.name: FiraCode Nerd Font
fira-code-nerd.description: Programming ligatures, extension of Fira Mono font, enlarged operators - very popular choice

hack-nerd.name: Hack Nerd Font
hack-nerd.description: Dotted zero, short descenders, expands upon work done for Bitstream Vera & DejaVu, legible at common sizes

caskaydia-cove-nerd.name: CaskaydiaCove Nerd Font
caskaydia-cove-nerd.description: Microsoft's Cascadia Code with Nerd Font glyphs - includes programming ligatures, designed for Windows Terminal

caskaydia-mono-nerd.name: CaskaydiaMono Nerd Font
caskaydia-mono-nerd.description: Like Cascadia Code but without any ligatures - for those who prefer no ligatures

iosevka-nerd.name: Iosevka Nerd Font
iosevka-nerd.description: Narrow and horizontally tight characters, slashed zero. Maximum information density.

iosevka-term-nerd.name: IosevkaTerm Nerd Font
iosevka-term-nerd.description: A narrower variant focusing on terminal uses - arrows and geometric symbols are narrow

iosevka-term-slab-nerd.name: IosevkaTermSlab Nerd Font
iosevka-term-slab-nerd.description: Nice as Iosevka but with slab serifs for a different aesthetic

meslo-lg-nerd.name: MesloLG Nerd Font
meslo-lg-nerd.description: Slashed zeros, customized version of Apple's Menlo - popular terminal font

terminus-nerd.name: Terminess Nerd Font
terminus-nerd.description: Squarish characters that are slightly askew - bitmap font aesthetic in TTF

gohu-nerd.name: Gohu Nerd Font
gohu-nerd.description: Bitmap font, tall capitals and ascenders, small serifs - distinctive look

geist-mono-nerd.name: GeistMono Nerd Font
geist-mono-nerd.description: Vercel's monospaced typeface designed for code editors, diagrams, terminals - very clean

space-mono-nerd.name: SpaceMono Nerd Font
space-mono-nerd.description: Squarish character lines, dotted zero, aggressive parentheses - Google Fonts

roboto-mono-nerd.name: RobotoMono Nerd Font
roboto-mono-nerd.description: Dashed zero, curved and straight character lines - Google's Roboto Mono

inconsolata-nerd.name: Inconsolata Nerd Font
inconsolata-nerd.description: Slashed zero, takes inspiration from many different fonts - very popular on Google Fonts

ubuntu-mono-nerd.name: UbuntuMono Nerd Font
ubuntu-mono-nerd.description: Dotted zeros, used the n, o, H & O Latin characters as a base for design - Ubuntu's monospace

source-code-pro-nerd.name: SauceCodePro Nerd Font
source-code-pro-nerd.description: Monospaced font family for user interface and coding environments - Adobe's Source Code Pro

victor-mono-nerd.name: VictorMono Nerd Font
victor-mono-nerd.description: Clean, crisp and narrow, with a large x-height and clear punctuation. Cursive italics are distinctive.

fantasque-sans-mono-nerd.name: FantasqueSansMono Nerd Font
fantasque-sans-mono-nerd.description: Wibbly-wobbly handwriting-like fuzziness, takes inspiration from Inconsolata and Monaco

agave-nerd.name: Agave Nerd Font
agave-nerd.description: A small, monospace, outline font that is geometrically regular and simple with a unique artistic feel

comic-shanns-mono-nerd.name: ComicShannsMono Nerd Font
comic-shanns-mono-nerd.description: The very typeface you've been trained to recognize since childhood - comic style monospace

commit-mono-nerd.name: CommitMono Nerd Font
commit-mono-nerd.description: An anonymous and neutral programming typeface, highly readable

blex-mono-nerd.name: BlexMono Nerd Font
blex-mono-nerd.description: It's global, it's versatile and it's distinctly IBM. Corporate and professional.

intel-one-mono-nerd.name: IntelOneMono Nerd Font
intel-one-mono-nerd.description: Expressive monospaced font family built with clarity, legibility, and developer needs in mind

monaspace-nerd.name: Monaspice Nerd Font
monaspace-nerd.description: Five matching fonts all having 'texture healing' to improve legibility - GitHub's font family

atkinson-hyperlegible-mono-nerd.name: Atkinson Hyperlegible Mono Nerd Font
atkinson-hyperlegible-mono-nerd.description: A monospaced font designed to improve legibility and readability for individuals with low vision

css.fontFace: font-family: 'Atkinson Hyperlegible Mono Nerd Font', 'AtkynsonMono', monospace;

opendyslexic-nerd.name: OpenDyslexic Nerd Font
opendyslexic-nerd.description: Designed specifically to alleviate reading errors caused by dyslexia - weighted bottoms for stability

3270-nerd.name: 3270 Nerd Font
3270-nerd.description: Derived from the x3270 font, a modern format of a font with high nostalgic IBM terminal value

bigblue-terminal-nerd.name: BigBlueTerminal Nerd Font
bigblue-terminal-nerd.description: Nostalgic, closely based on IBM's 8x14 EGA/VGA charset

proggy-clean-nerd.name: ProggyClean Nerd Font
proggy-clean-nerd.description: Designed particularly for use at small point sizes - bitmap-like clarity

hasklug-nerd.name: Hasklug Nerd Font
hasklug-nerd.description: Monospaced ligatures make composite glyphs (e.g. ->) more readable, especially in Haskell

lilex-nerd.name: Lilex Nerd Font
lilex-nerd.description: Modern with ligatures and a distinctive geometric design

zed-mono-nerd.name: ZedMono Nerd Font
zed-mono-nerd.description: Zed Mono is a more rounded version of Iosevka - from Zed editor creators

martian-mono-nerd.name: MartianMono Nerd Font
martian-mono-nerd.description: Free and open-source monospaced font from Evil Martians - great for UI

recursive-mono-nerd.name: RecMono Nerd Font
recursive-mono-nerd.description: Inspired by casual script signpainting, 4 variants with linear, casual, mono styles

dejavu-sans-mono-nerd.name: DejaVuSansMono Nerd Font
dejavu-sans-mono-nerd.description: Dotted zero, based on the Bitstream Vera Fonts with a wider range of characters

liberation-mono-nerd.name: LiberationMono Nerd Font
liberation-mono-nerd.description: 0 and O very similar, very short tight descenders - metrically compatible with Courier New

envy-code-r-nerd.name: EnvyCodeR Nerd Font
envy-code-r-nerd.description: Fully-scalable monospaced font designed for programming and command prompts

hermit-nerd.name: Hermit Nerd Font
hermit-nerd.description: Symbols stand out from common text - clear and distinctive
